alert.note: Alert for Ozaukee; Sheboygan; Washington (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 8:05PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ozaukee, southeastern Fond du Lac, eastern Washington and southwestern Sheboygan Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 805 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Campbellsport, or near Kewaskum, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Bend, Grafton, Cedarburg, Jackson, Saukville, Kewaskum, Germantown, Newburg, Fillmore, Kirchhayn, Boltonville, New Fane, and Keowns. This includes the following highways... Interstate 43 between mile markers 92 and 97. Interstate 41 between mile markers 59 and 62. U.S. Highway 45 between mile markers 61 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
